meanings.definition: The act of ennobling or being ennobled.
meanings.sent1: The ennoblements of the kind teacher inspired her students to be better people.
meanings.sent2: The ennoblements bestowed upon the brave soldier were well-deserved.
meanings.sent3: The ennoblements of the mischievous puppy made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ennoblements were like a shining beacon of hope in a dark world.
meanings.sent5: The ennoblements of the wise king were legendary throughout the land.

meanings.definition: The process of elevating to a noble rank or status.
meanings.sent1: Through hard work and dedication, he achieved the ennoblements he had always dreamed of.
meanings.sent2: The ennoblements of the humble farmer surprised everyone in the village.
meanings.sent3: The ennoblements of the clumsy knight led to some hilarious mishaps at the royal banquet.
meanings.sent4: Her ennoblements were like a ladder to success, each step bringing her closer to her goals.
meanings.sent5: The ennoblements of the talented artist were recognized far and wide.
